songs.title: Doo Wop / Never Leave You
songs.lyrics:
[Chorus ]
Guys you know you'd better
Watch out
Some girls, some girls are only
About
That thing, that thing, that thing
That thing, that thing, that thing

[Verse 1]
It's been three weeks since you've been looking for your friend
The one you let hit it and never called you again
To begin, how you think you really going to pretend
If you did it then, then you'll probably again

Baby no
Respect is just a minimum
They mess you up
And you're still defending them

[Chorus]

(Oh) Look out, look out
(Oh) Watch out, watch out
(Oh) Look out, look out
(Oh) Watch out, watch out
(Oh) Look out, look out (yeah yeah yeah)
(Oh) Watch out, watch out (yeah yeah yeah)
(Oh) Look out, look out (yeah yeah yeah)
Watch out

Oh oh oh oh I'll never leave you
Oh oh oh oh (yeah yeah yeah)[x4]

Honestly, if I tell (Oh oh oh oh)
Tell you what (Oh oh oh oh)
What you want to know love

(Oh oh oh oh) There isn't no other
(Oh oh oh oh) Don't want no other lover
(Oh oh oh oh) I'll put nothing above you
(Oh oh oh oh) I'll kick them to the gutter

[Verse 2]
If you want me to stay
I'll never leave
If you want me to stay
We'll always be
If you want me to stay
Love endlessly
If you want me to stay, if you want me to stay, I'll never leave you

Oh oh (yeah yeah)
Oh oh (yeah yeah)
Oh oh (yeah yeah)
Oh oh

[Outro]
I'll never leave you
